column4: Latest;Lightning strikes continue to kill and injure people across the country.------A 45 year old man was killed in Kampong Thom on May 23
column5: and a 30 year was seriously injured in the same province. Both men were farmers.------A 25 year old woman was killed and her two children injured by a lightning strike on the same day as they waited on a river bank for her husband to land his fishing catch.------Also on the 23rd
column8: 7 cows from the same herd died from a strike in Pursat.------Cambodia has some of the highest rates of lightning deaths by population
